data.name: dnnlblEnableRSS.Help
data.value: If checked, RSS feeds will be enabled.

data.name: dnnlblNameFormat.Help
data.value: The format used when displaying post author/editor names throughout the module.

data.name: dnnlblHomePageSize.Help
data.value: The maximum number of questions to display in the home view of the module.

data.name: dnnlblAutoApprove.Help
data.value: If checked, all questions and answers will be auto approved (this is enabled by default and the recommended configuration for this module).

data.name: dnnlblAnswerPageSize.Help
data.value: The maximum number of records to display for answers in a single page. This setting also determines if a user will be require an extra step to see the Answer input area.

data.name: dnnlblFromEmail.Help
data.value: The "From" email address on all outgoing emails from this module.

data.name: dnnlblMaxTags.Help
data.value: The maximum number of terms that can be associated with a question. The minimum is 1.

data.name: dnnlblMinBodyChars.Help
data.value: The minimum number of characters required for a question or answer body of content.

data.name: dnnlblMinTitleChars.Help
data.value: The minimum number of characters required for a question title.

data.name: dnnlblTagHistory.Help
data.value: The maximum number of revisions that are stored for a tag, going above this number will remove the oldest record for a specific tag.

data.name: dnnlblDailyFlags.Help
data.value: The number of posts a user can flag for moderator attention on any given day.

data.name: dnnlblEditOwn.Help
data.value: The number of posts (questions & answers combined) a user must have to edit their own posts.

data.name: dnnlblHomeTagSize.Help
data.value: The maximum number of terms to display on the home page view of the module.

data.name: dnnlblMaxTagsTags.Help
data.value: The maximum number of tags to display on the tags page in this module.

data.name: dnnlblFPSC.Help
data.value: The number of flags, dedicated to spam, each user receives daily (this is reset every 24 hours).

data.name: dnnlblPCVWM.Help
data.value: The length of time allotted for the end user to change their vote on a specific post.

data.name: dnnlblPFCC.Help
data.value: The number of flags a post must receive before it is 'removed' from the user interface (for normal users).

data.name: dnnlblPFWH.Help
data.value: The number of hours allowed for user's to flag a post (starts when the first flag is submitted, resets each additional flag vote).

data.name: dnnlblQCCVC.Help
data.value: This is the number of 'close question' votes a question must receive in order to become closed. This action can only be performed by moderators and users with the proper reputation level.

data.name: dnnlblQCWD.Help
data.value: The time allotted for a question to be closed (via voting, in days). This time resets based on the latest vote.

data.name: dnnlblQFHRC.Help
data.value: The number of times a question must be flagged before it is removed from the home page display (of the module).

data.name: dnnlblTCWD.Help
data.value: The number of days permitted for closing a tag.

data.name: dnnlblTFCC.Help
data.value: The number of flags a tag must receive before it is rejected.

data.name: dnnlblTFWH.Help
data.value: The number of hours permitted for user's to flag a tag for removal (starts when the first flag is submitted, resets each additional vote).

data.name: dnnlblTSAC.Help
data.value: The number of up-votes a synonym must receive in order to be associated with the master term (then automatic replacement occurs).

data.name: dnnlblTSMC.Help
data.value: The maximum number of synonyms that can be related to a single term.

data.name: dnnlblTSRC.Help
data.value: The number of down-votes a synonym must receive before it is rejected.

data.name: dnnlblUCVC.Help
data.value: The number of closing votes a user is permitted to cast daily (this is reset every 24 hours).

data.name: dnnlblUFPMC.Help
data.value: The number of flags each user receives daily (this is reset every 24 hours).

data.name: dnnlblUTSCMAC.Help
data.value: The minimum number of answers a user must provide (associated w/ the master term) to be permitted to create a term synonym (assuming they have the privilege to do so).

data.name: dnnlblUTSVMASC.Help
data.value: The minimum number of answers a user must provide (associated w/ the master term) in order to vote on a synonym's approval (assuming they have the privilege to do so).

data.name: dnnlblUUVAC.Help
data.value: The number of up-votes a user can cast daily on answers (this is reset every 24 hours).

data.name: dnnlblUUVQC.Help
data.value: The number of up-votes a user can cast daily on questions (this is reset every 24 hours).

data.name: dnnlblVocabRoot.Help
data.value: The vocabulary root used for your folksonomy. Currently, this is forced to be 'Tags'.

data.name: dnnlblHomeTagUsageType.Help
data.value: This setting determines what count should be displayed next to each tag in the 'Recent Tags' list. This count represents the number of questions associated with the tag based on the selected time frame (daily, weekly, monthly, total).

data.name: dnnlblBrowseQPageSize.Help
data.value: The number of questions to display in the browse page (this is the search results, my questions, and my answers views).

data.name: dnnlblQuestionEmailTemplate.Help
data.value: This is the email template used for single question emails. Summary emails (ie. multiple questions) use a different template.

data.name: dnnlblSummaryEmailTemplate.Help
data.value: This is the email template used for tag summary emails. Summary emails (ie. multiple questions) use a different template.

data.name: dnnlblAnswerEmailTemplate.Help
data.value: This is the email template used for sending out notification about a new answer in response to a question. (NOTE: This is not a summary email)

data.name: dnnlblCommentEmailTemplate.Help
data.value: This is the email template used for sending out notification about a new comment. Anytime a comment is added to the question or answers, users who are subscribed to the question will receive a notification.

data.name: dnnlblEnableLinkedIn.Help
data.value: If checked, the linked in share button will be displayed in the Question view.

data.name: dnnlblEnablePlusOne.Help
data.value: If checked, Google +1 will be enabled for sharing questions.

data.name: dnnlblEnableTwitter.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to Tweet questions.

data.name: dnnlblFacebookAppId.Help
data.value: To enable Facebook likes, you must enter a Facebook application ID.

data.name: dnnlblQHMS.Help
data.value: This is the minimum score required (votes) in order for an item to be displayed on the home page (in addition to the flag removal count).

data.name: dnnlblEditOthers.Help
data.value: The number of posts (questions & answers combined) a user must have to edit others posts.
